name: Sneaking Critical
text: Your critical hits are particularly deadly.
prerequisites: Critical Focus, base attack bonus +9, sneak attack class feature.
benefit: Whenever you confirm a critical hit on a sneak attack, you can roll an additional number of sneak attack dice equal to your weaponâ€™s critical modifier.
special: You can apply the effects of only one critical feat to a given critical hit unless you possess Critical Mastery.
